attributes.action: Make Same-sex Intrauterine insemination available on the NHS in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Same-sex couples cannot currently receive publically funded assistance with starting a family unless there are underlying fertility problems. We want a change in this policy.

We want Intrauterine insemination for lesbian couples in Northern Ireland without them having to have sexual intercourse with a male. Trying to conceive naturally for however long is unreasonable and discriminatory.
